issue.title: [Packaging][Python] Update macos and windows wheel filenames
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7774](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7774). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/67e34c53b3be4c88348369f8109626b4a8a997aa the macosx wheels have different platform tag and the windows wheel tag needs to be fixed as well.

comments.body:
